[API] Listing user groups

You can display a list of all the user groups in the account domain.

HTTP request syntax (URI) 

GET https://ipAddress:port/v1/security/account-domains/id/groups

Use the domain ID as the id.

Request structure

Not applicable.

Response structure

{
  "groups": [
    ""
  ]
}

Parameter

Type

Description

groups String Groups in the account domain.

Return codes

Status code

HTTP name

Description

200 OK Success
401 Unauthorized The operation is not authorized.
403 Forbidden The server failed to authenticate the request.
404 Not found The specified resource does not exist.
